name: Davidoff - Chefs Edition - 2021
additionalNotes: In the 2021 Chefs Edition Cigar, the Davidoff Master Blenders have joined their expertise with four world-class chefs renowned for their extraordinary culinary creations â€“ Juan Amador, Norbert Niederkofler, Masa Takayama and Jorge Vallejo. The unconventional team of connoisseurs link in this limited edition the shared values of kitchen and cigar artistry: pure ingredients, local sourcing, sustainability and attention to detail and quality.
